TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Handling of recursive / circular references of units
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective of this test is to assess the ability to process units with recursiv/ circular references.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Producer is capable to create units with recursiv / circular references and the consumer is able to handle them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if systems can handle recursive / circular references.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a UnitA which references on itself as Observer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives the information and displays it correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates UnitB and UnitC. UnitB is the Observer of UnitC and UnitC is the Observer of UnitB.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives the information and displays it correctly.
